pathTokens: Bright Angel Creek Bouldering A.K.A. Phantom Ranch

content.description: This amazing Feature lies on the river side of the Bright Angel camp ground. As a matter of fact it arches right over the trail. Marked with trail signs as being loose, it is actually quite solid for climbing and hosts a multitude of difficult, futuristic, overhanging problems. The most classic being the 100+ foot long Bright Angel and Dark Angel traverses.
